court: Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit

opinions.snippet:
COFFEY, Circuit Judge,
concurring in part, dissenting in part.
Section 3(8) of the Occupational Safety and Health Act defines “occupational safety and health standard” as a standard which requires the adoption of practices “reasonably necessary or appropriate to provide safe or healthful employment and places of employment.” 29 U.S.C. § 652(8) (emphasis added). opinions.snippet:
OPINION AND ORDER *
CONBOY, District Judge:
This is a petition for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.
